display_information.name: FedRAMP Email Alert
display_information.description: Notify Slack of FedRAMP emails (to meet Security Inbox requirements)
display_information.long_description: Sends alerts in Slack when a new email is received from FedRAMP (fedramp_security@gsa.gov or fedramp_security@fedramp.gov) at Emergency, Emergency Test, or Important levels in accordance with the FedRAMP Security Inbox requirements. Configured Nov 26 2025 by Isaac at Paramify.
